message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "We utilize a combination of the Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS) for sub-Saharan African countries and the World Bank's WDI database to analyze the impact of education on child mortality rates.", "dataset": ["Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS)", "World Bank's WDI database"], "topic": ["Education", "Health"]}, {"sentence": "In this study, we analyze the relationship between air pollution and economic growth in India using nightlight data from satellite imagery and the World Health Organization's Ambient Air Pollution Database.", "dataset": ["nightlight data from satellite imagery", "World Health Organization's Ambient Air Pollution Database"], "topic": ["Environment", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "Our analysis utilizes household survey data collected by the Central Statistical Office of Zambia and GIS data from the Land Resources Management Centre.", "dataset": ["household survey data collected by the Central Statistical Office of Zambia", "GIS data from the Land Resources Management Centre"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "To investigate the impact of extractive industries on local economic development, we combine data from firm-level surveys and an administrative dataset of mining licenses in Colombia.", "dataset": ["firm-level surveys", "administrative dataset of mining licenses in Colombia"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries", "Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "This paper explores the determinants of renewable energy subsidies and their impact on carbon emissions using data from the International Energy Agency and the World Bank's Climate Change Knowledge Portal.", "dataset": ["International Energy Agency", "World Bank's Climate Change Knowledge Portal"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "Our study combines household survey data with remote sensing data to examine the relationship between access to water and poverty levels in Sub-Saharan Africa.", "dataset": ["household survey data", "remote sensing data"], "topic": ["Water", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "To evaluate the effectiveness of social protection policies, we use panel data from the World Bank's Living Standards Measurement Study and administrative data on cash transfer programs in Mexico.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Living Standards Measurement Study", "administrative data on cash transfer programs in Mexico"], "topic": ["Social Protection", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze the relationship between road infrastructure, trade, and economic growth using data from the World Bank's Doing Business database and a gravity model of trade flows.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Doing Business database"], "topic": ["Infrastructure", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "Our study uses data from the Global Terrorism Database and regression analysis to examine the relationship between political violence and economic development in fragile states.", "dataset": ["Global Terrorism Database"], "topic": ["Fragility, Conflict, and Violence", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "To investigate the impact of gender quotas on political representation, we combine survey data on political attitudes with data on elected officials from the Inter-Parliamentary Union.", "dataset": ["survey data on political attitudes", "data on elected officials from the Inter-Parliamentary Union"], "topic": ["Gender", "Governance"]}]
